DOC.brief_summary: Open surgery and CO2 laser surgery are both established treatment modalities for T1N0 glottic carcinoma. It is controversial for T1N0 glottic carcinoma with anterior commissure involved.
DOC.brief_title: CO2 Laser and Open Surgery for T1N0 Glottic SCC With Anterior Commissure Involved
DOC.criteria: T1N0 SCC of glottic carcinoma with anterior commissure involve No nodal metastasis and distant metastasis All patients must have CT/MR and electronic laryngoscope test before surgery and after surgery Expected lifetime>1 year Patients and families agreed to participate in the test and sign the informed consent Without cognitive impairment. With severe cardiac insufficiency Liver and kidney function is not complete systemic infection patients Patients with pregnancy and lactation Have surgery contraindications
DOC.keyword: T1N0 squamous cell carcinoma of glottis with anterior commissure involved
